entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
